Flask-Stargate Doumentation¶

Note

This project is currently under development. First version will soon be released. Currently flask-stargate has only test for GET and POST endpoints. More tests and features will be added soon. Docs for PATCH and DELETE method will be updated after test completion.

Stargate is a framework for exposing RESTFul JSON APIs using Flask and Flask-SQLAlchemy. Currently it provides GET, POST, PATCH, DELETE endpoints against resources, pagination, filters, sorting, grouping, resource expansion and partial responses.
